Text:
TORRENT DESCRIPTION:

avg. rating... about 4/10

Following a heavy girl's night out, Isabel, and another young professional woman grab a mini-cab home. Our heroine quickly realizes the cabbie isn't part of her plot support when he antagonistically pulls her into an ally and violently takes her body away from her in both a sexual and literal manner. An ancient Vampress witnesses the story unfolding and moved by Isabel's innocence, dispatches the Cabbie refunds the difference to Isabel by giving her a drop of her Vampire blood essence. Isabel rises from her human death into a new reality of existence as a Vampiress.  Isabel has just two days to accept her new condition as a member of the living dead... which will she choose? What would you choose?
the description is same as blood moon riseing
no its not the same sorry
